channel.title: Magical Multiverse Tour—Iron Edda: Kaldheim Chaos
channel.description:
![Beskir Shieldmate|512x376](upload://ldSuGYPhdoH0V6lHya48FI3CgMi.jpeg) You are the staunch defenders of a Bretagard holdfast, keeping your village safe from raiders and beasts. Until the skies broke, the realms collided, and a Doomskar like none before rocked your world. How will you push back the threats that have emerged—and what terrible bonds will you forge along the way?
We will be playing four sessions of [Iron Edda: World of Metal and Bone](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/152277/Iron-Edda-World-of-Metal-and-Bone), a PbtA game of heavy metal Viking action, where PCs are berserkers, shieldmaidens, and others battling monstrous dwarf-forged mechanical titans—and sometimes bonding with the the bones of ancient giants and riding them around like mecha. Yeah, it’s metal like that.
Our setting is [Kaldheim](https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/welcome-face-melting-world-kaldheim-2020-12-14), a Norse-myth-inspired world from the lore of Magic: The Gathering.
This is the first of a Magical Multiverse Tour series of me running games set on various planes of Magic: The Gathering. Given that most characters cannot cross between these worlds, there will be very little continuity or crossovers, but perhaps the occasional Easter egg…
NUMBER OF SESSIONS: There will be 4 sessions in total. Being able to attend each session is ideal. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
DURATION: 3 hours
NUMBER OF PLAYERS: 4 players total. One slot is reserved for Danielle B.
SAFETY TOOLS IN USE: We will use CATS, the X-Card, Lines & Veils, and the Open Door Policy. This event abides by the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
SET UP INFO: We will play over Streamyard. Expect a set-up email from me about a week before the first session, with a link to a Google sheet character keeper.
BREAKS: two ten-minute breaks (and more as requested)
RECORDED: Provided all players give permission, sessions will be recorded and posted to the Cloven Pine Games Youtube channel.
PRIOR EXPERIENCE REQUIRED: No, rules will be taught in play. Additionally, you don't need to know anything about Magic: The Gathering or its lore. I'll cover the basics of the setting.

@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Magical Multiverse Tour—Iron Edda: Kaldheim Chaos (Session 4/4)
Starring: Brandon B, Danielle B, @Jan_Petrykowski, Josh H
In the thrilling finale, tensions in the Holdfast come to a head… just as a terrible army of the dead and a mechanical monstrosity arrive! Hillevi questions her purpose and takes a new Vow, Ulf grapples with the dark bargains his mother made, Otarr gives up everything but his secret about Hillevi’s parentage, and Siða reunites with her long-lost brother.

Magical Multiverse Tour—Iron Edda: Kaldheim Chaos (Session 3/4)
Starring: Brandon B, Danielle B, @Jan_Petrykowski, Josh H
After clashing with a vampire dragon, our heroes drag themselves back to the holdfast at last. Siða contends with suspicions about her outlaw status, Otarr implores the ailing Jarl to trust a troll, Ulf sees the specter of his mother, and Hillevi engages in a duel of honor—with deadly results.

Magical Multiverse Tour—Iron Edda: Kaldheim Chaos (Session 2/4)

Starring: Brandon B, Danielle B, @Jan_Petrykowski, Josh H

Our heroes work to recruit a troll and bring her safely to the holdfast. Ulf creates a magical zone of truth, Otarr gains an unlikely blood-sibling, Hillevi takes on a war mammoth head on, and Siða calls up the bones of an ancient giant… to confront a terrible beast from Immerstrum!

item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Magical Multiverse Tour—Iron Edda: Kaldheim Chaos (Session 1/4)

Starring: Brandon B, Danielle B, @Jan_Petrykowski, Josh H

In our first session, we build our holdfast then throw our characters into adventure. Seeking out a wise troll, the Vargr Siða encounters an ambush. The Berserker Hillevi charges into the fray, while the Skald Otarr unleashes a driving drum solo and the Seiðkona Ulf finds his magic put to the test. What dangers await these warriors in the wild… and back at the holdfast?
